title: Embodied Cognition-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary math concepts and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Project execution by mathematics practitioners to solve complex problems through embodied cognitive activities.

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical problem-solving strategies with 80% accuracy through embodied cognitive activities (hand gestures, spatial movement, etc.)
Learners can design over three mathematical problem-solving models tailored to real work environments by analyzing embodied cognition application cases
Learners can complete digital portfolios sharing embodied learning experiences using smartphone-based collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
